articles.description: Game engine giant Unity isn’t killing its despised runtime fee, but it is offering developers options to avoid it or otherwise reduce costs.

articles.description: Senator Menendez, a long-time critic of Bitcoin and other crypto for its alleged association with criminals, faces up to 20 years in prison if convicted.

articles.description: Champions Arena is a turn-based fantasy RPG from Gala Games, where characters can become NFTs and crypto can be used to purchase gems, one of the game's synthetic currencies. Decrypt's Kate Irwin takes us inside the game for her thoughts on the fun, mobile-first title.
